content.text: For me, I am driven by two main philosophies: know more today about the world than I knew yesterday and lessen the suffering of others. You'd be surprised how far that gets you.
To dare to live alone is the rarest courage; since there are many who had rather meet their bitterest enemy in the field, than their own hearts in their closet.
WH—WHO ARE THESE OTHER PEOPLE POSTING ON MY WALL?! CEASE AND DESIST IMMEDIATELY OR I SHALL PUT YOU TO DEATH!
Now Pink—Malfoy!—we shall try to take over the world!
